help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Frequently asked questions to help you quickly understand the PLASMA platform
help.contactDesc: Contact our 7√ó24 online customer service, we are here to serve you

wallet.title: Wallet Connection
wallet.a1: Click the 'Connect Wallet' button in the top right corner and select your preferred wallet (OKX, TokenPocket, Bitget, MetaMask, etc.). First-time connection requires authorization confirmation in your wallet.
wallet.a2: PLASMA supports mainstream wallets such as OKX, TokenPocket, Bitget, MetaMask, and other wallets via WalletConnect. We recommend using wallets compatible with the Plasma network.
wallet.a3: Please ensure: 1) Wallet is installed and unlocked; 2) Network is switched to Plasma mainnet; 3) Wallet version is up to date. If still unable to connect, try switching to another wallet or contact customer service.

deposit.title: Deposit & Network
deposit.q1: Which network should I use for deposits?
deposit.a1: Users must deposit via the Plasma network. Do not use BSC, Ethereum or other networks for deposits, otherwise assets will not arrive. Please confirm your wallet is switched to Plasma mainnet before depositing.
deposit.q2: How to deposit assets to Plasma network?
deposit.a2: You can bridge USDT0 from Ethereum to Plasma network via cross-chain bridges (such as Stargate), or directly select Plasma network for deposits on exchanges/wallets that support Plasma. Deposit address can be viewed on the wallet page.
deposit.q3: How much XPL is needed for Gas?
deposit.a3: Plasma network uses XPL as Gas fee. It is recommended to reserve a small amount of XPL in your wallet to pay for Gas fees for on-chain transactions such as deposits, staking, and withdrawals. Specific consumption depends on transaction complexity.

staking.title: Staking & Rewards
staking.a1: After connecting your wallet, select the staking amount (500ÔΩû30,000 USDT0) on the homepage, click 'Stake Now' and confirm the transaction. After successful staking, rewards will be automatically settled daily.
staking.a2: PLASMA provides approximately 20% stable monthly returns. Daily reward = Staking amount √ó 20% √∑ 30. Rewards are automatically distributed to your account daily and can be viewed or withdrawn at any time.
staking.q3: What are the staking amount limits?
staking.a3: Single staking amount ranges from 500ÔΩû30,000 USDT0, with support for multiple additional stakes. Minimum 500 USDT0 to start, can be flexibly adjusted according to needs.
staking.q4: When can I withdraw principal and rewards?
staking.a4: Staked principal cannot be withdrawn during the withdrawal cooldown period and can be freely withdrawn after the cooldown period expires. Accumulated interest can be withdrawn at any time without cooldown restrictions. Specific rules are subject to product terms.

referral.title: Referral & Commission
referral.a1: Go to 'Profile' ‚Üí 'Invite Friends', copy your exclusive invitation link or QR code and share with friends. After friends register via the link and complete staking, you will receive commission.
referral.a2: After inviting friends to stake, you can earn 20% commission from direct referrals' staking rewards and 10% commission from second-level referrals' staking rewards. Commission is calculated based on friends' staking rewards, subject to current activity rules.
referral.a3: After friends complete staking, commission will be automatically settled to your account and can be viewed in 'My Team'. Commission can be withdrawn at any time.

security.title: Security & Account
security.a1: PLASMA smart contracts have been audited by CertiK for security and use multi-signature mechanisms to protect fund security. We recommend you keep your wallet mnemonic phrase safe and never disclose it to others.

other.title: Other Questions
other.a1: You can get 7√ó24 online support via 'Profile' ‚Üí 'Contact Customer Service'. You can also contact us through official Telegram, Twitter and other channels.
other.a2: PLASMA only supports the Plasma network. Deposits, staking, rewards and withdrawals all need to be completed on the Plasma network. Blockchain explorer can be accessed at plasmascan.to to query transaction records.
other.a3: Yes. On-chain operations such as connecting wallet, deposits, staking, and withdrawals require paying XPL as Gas fee. Please ensure your wallet has enough XPL to complete transactions. Please select Plasma network when depositing.

plasmaOne.title: Plasma Network
plasmaOne.a1: Plasma is a Layer 1 blockchain designed specifically for global stablecoin payments.
plasmaOne.a2: USDT0 is the cross-chain version of USDT launched by Tether in 2025, also known as 'Omnichain USDT'. Simply put, it's an upgraded version of regular USDT that primarily solves issues of liquidity fragmentation, high fees, slow speeds, and the need for bridging or wrapping when transferring USDT between different blockchains. Core features: Unified liquidity pool where all USDT0 across chains share liquidity, with near-zero slippage and low fees (close to 0 gas in many scenarios). Difference from regular USDT: USDT0 focuses more on payments, DeFi, and cross-chain scenarios. It's not replacing USDT but complementing it, especially suitable for multi-chain users and institutions.
plasmaOne.a3: Stablecoins are borderless digital dollars built for the internet, providing stable and convenient ways to send, hold, and use, avoiding price volatility.
plasmaOne.q4: What are the core advantages of choosing Plasma?
plasmaOne.a4: As a stablecoin-dedicated network, Plasma offers: zero-fee USDT transfers, custom Gas tokens, and confidential transactions. These features create a faster, lower-cost, and smoother payment experience for developers and end users, making it the ideal infrastructure for capital flow applications.
plasmaOne.a5: PlasmaBFT - a high-performance Fast HotStuff consensus protocol implemented in Rust, combining Byzantine Fault Tolerance (BFT) security with low-latency finality to meet the high throughput and determinism requirements of stablecoin-grade applications.
plasmaOne.q6: What is the technical foundation of Plasma's execution layer?
plasmaOne.a6: Plasma's execution layer is powered by Reth, a modular Ethereum execution client developed in Rust that enables efficient state execution while maintaining EVM compatibility.
plasmaOne.q7: How does Plasma differ from other blockchains in terms of stablecoin optimization?
plasmaOne.a7: Network innovations include: zero-fee USDT transfers, custom Gas tokens, and compliant confidential transactions. These features make it the optimal blockchain for global capital flows. Additionally, Plasma supports thousands of transactions per second with robust enterprise-grade network security, fully meeting current and future stablecoin demands.
plasmaOne.q8: Does Plasma network have other additional features?
plasmaOne.a8: Yes, Plasma network will deploy a trustless Bitcoin cross-chain bridge. As the network evolves, features will continue to be added to build a thriving application ecosystem.
plasmaOne.q9: Why are USDT transfers on Plasma fee-free?
plasmaOne.a9: Through protocol-managed Gas sponsorship mechanisms, native token requirements are eliminated, enabling frictionless payments particularly suitable for micro-remittances and global business scenarios.
plasmaOne.q10: How does Plasma blockchain maintain network value with zero fees enabled?
plasmaOne.a10: Only basic USDT transactions are Gas-free; other transactions require XPL fees, ensuring validator incentives and network economic sustainability.

xpl.title: XPL
xpl.q1: What is XPL token and how is it used?
xpl.a1: XPL is Plasma's native token, used to pay transaction fees and maintain network security, similar to ETH on Ethereum or BTC on Bitcoin network. XPL secures the network through Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism and aligns long-term incentives with global stablecoin adoption.
xpl.a2: Total supply is 10 billion tokens, distributed as follows: 10% public sale, 40% ecosystem development, 25% team allocation, 25% investor allocation. In the public sale, 1 billion XPL tokens were distributed to users who participated in deposit activities.
xpl.a3: Non-US users: Instant release at mainnet beta launch. US users: 12-month lock period (until July 28, 2026). Team and investors: 3-year linear unlock with first year as cliff period.

wxpl.title: WXPL
wxpl.a1: WXPL (Wrapped XPL) is the wrapped version of Plasma blockchain's native token XPL, commonly found on BSC (Binance Smart Chain), Solana, or other EVM-compatible chains for cross-chain circulation and DeFi usage. Simply put: XPL is Plasma chain's native Gas Token (used for transaction fees, staking, governance), while WXPL is the "wrapped" version of XPL for use on other chains (similar to WETH, WBTC, WBNB logic).
